channel.title: Ultraviolet Grasslands: Planet Caravan
channel.description:
![El6SympUYAAVIcp|644x500](upload://bIKr3E8XICfWPgYWzlmaKEOyHKQ.jpeg) *We sail through endless skies* *Stars shine like eyes* *The black night sighs* *The moon in silver trees* *Falls down in tears* *Light of the night* Planet Caravan – Black Sabbath
Session 1 [date=2020-12-05 time=18:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] Session 2 [date=2020-12-12 time=18:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] Session 3 [date=2020-12-19 time=18:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"]
Ultraviolet Grasslands is a psychedelic metal setting by Luka Rejec about exploration, survival, drugs and resource management. This is a continuation of the adventures of the Cogflower Caravan on her journey to the Black City. We will be using Whitehack, a rules lite version of the world's most popular RPG. This event is scheduled to run for 3 hours. It will be recorded assuming all parties agree. There will be 3 sessions in December. Being able to attend each session is ideal but not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend.
This game will follow the Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct: https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html. We will be using [the X-Card](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1SB0jsx34bWHZWbnNIVVuMjhDkrdFGo1_hSC2BWPlI3A/edit) and other safety tools players suggest.
